blog.name: harveytolibao
blog.title:
BALLPENS
harveytolibao
blog.description: Its all about my work, my life, my artwork | illustrations and my ballpen drawings ...

summary: ..theres a very thin line on committing projects and commissions. if you are good with time management, then you can do both...
caption:
..theres a very thin line on committing projects and commissions. if you are good with time management, then you can do both but, theres but, if the pressures catches you then all youre doing goes tumbling along the way. thats why for me handling several stuffs i always stay very selective on the extra work that i have to do. coz when a project was tight and very time committing then its hard to do those extra art. i really love illustrations thats not connected of what you do coz you can always fo some stuff and experiment on the piece. if your one of those guys who i owe artworks please bear with me, i wanted to do them as i could but projects is one of the reasons why an artist keep surviving. ive known a lot of guys in the industry that can do one or the other but i still salute and respect those artist that can do both. if you guys have some ideas of how to do both please share, really wanted to know how you guys doing it. hit the comment and share how you guys manage your projects and extra stuff. now heres me catching up with commissions after so many months, ending sunday like this. #marvelcomics #marvel #ladythor #mightythor #thor #illustration #beinspired #drawing #love #sketches #plan #tightpencils #labanlang #exploreart #comicartwork #comicillustration #stabilo #stabilloothello #stabilopencil #harveytolibao #fundraising (at Harvey T. Studio)
https://www.instagram.com/p/BuRev2TnIhF/?utm_source=ig_tumblr_share&igshid=17xldcgihcfsb

summary: Gamora's upbringing with Thanos was one of abuse, as shown many times and explicitly stated in some scenes. Thanos didn't feel a...
body: Gamora’s upbringing with Thanos was one of abuse, as shown many times and explicitly stated in some scenes. Thanos didn’t feel a true mutral father-daughter love towards Gamora but merely an infatuation of her as an object he could could control. Therefore, the murder of Gamora shouldn’t have allowed Thanos to recieve the soul stone, in this essay i will-

blog.name: loveandsupportforcaptainmarvel
blog.title: Captain Marvel Doesn't Care For Your Sexism
blog.description: Blog dedicated to standing up to the hate directed at Captain Marvel

tags: why don't you just say you hate women to save your energy
summary: Marvel: *Makes Antman and The Wasp* Whiny White Boys: *Seething with anger but can’t hate on the movie because it still stars a...
body:
Marvel: *Makes Antman and The Wasp*

Whiny White Boys: *Seething with anger but can’t hate on the movie because it still stars a man*

Marvel: *Makes Captain Marvel*

Whiny White Boys: “This movie just doesn’t look good to me. I don’t know what it is, but I’m just not feeling it. I think this movie will be what ends the franchise. Disney needs to stop it with their progressive propaganda, they’re ruining all the good franchises! Plus, Brie Larson is sexist and racist! I don’t condone sexism and racism, so I’ll have to pass on this movie.”

reblog.comment:

Whiny White Boys: *Seething with anger but can’t hate on the movie because it still stars a man*

Whiny White Boys: “This movie just doesn’t look good to me. I don’t know what it is, but I’m just not feeling it. I think this movie will be what ends the franchise. Disney needs to stop it with their progressive propaganda, they’re ruining all the good franchises! Plus, Brie Larson is sexist and racist! I don’t condone sexism and racism, so I’ll have to pass on this movie.”

Disney needs to stop it with their progressive propaganda, they’re ruining all the good franchises! Plus, Brie Larson is sexist and racist! I don’t condone sexism and racism, so I’ll have to pass on this movie.”

Disney needs to stop it with their progressive propaganda, they’re ruining all the good franchises! Plus, Brie Larson is sexist and racist! I don’t condone sexism and racism, so I’ll have to pass on this movie.”

blog.name: nanigives
blog.title: NaniGives
blog.description: Hi! I'm trying to improve my digital art while showing some love to the stuff I like, enjoy. Also if you want to find my drawings go to the ‘my fanart’ or ‘my art’ tag

body:
Comics pet peeves

I’ve got to get these pet peeves off my chest man, like don’t take these too serious cus I’m not too passionate about the subject but I’ve been thinking for once:

> excessive detail doesn’t make a comic book drawing style good

> drawing bo*bs wrong or exactly the same in this day and age (aside from the small window of opportunity that comes with a well loved style; example BTAS) is a demonstration that your style is lacking and needs to be improved

> drawing s*xy or scantily clad women as a cover is old and (not referencing adult works or characters deliberately characterised in this way, like Catwoman for example) boring now. Where is the diversity, the strength that comes with being a female super hero or just super? Be creative man

> similar or identical body types among characters is boring unless you’ve got an extremely strong differentiating characteristic that covers this ( distinctive features)

> a ton of black shading doesn’t necessarily make a drawing good because it’s dramatic

> a bold, black outline doesn’t automatically improve a drawing

> excessively pouty lips deliberately used to make a character s*xi*r does come off as out of place, especially when it’s a combat orientated female character ( you know when they shade it with that blush? Pet peeve idk why but I’m not talking about normal pouty lips, I’m talking bout those big ass ones that usually get paired up with dark eyes and a small nose and you can kind of tell the artist is a bit h**ny let’s not lie)

> male characters with their geni**lia outlined in costume, same goes with female characters and their bo*bs

> needless s*x scenes

Alright I’m good for now, and yes I was thinking of particular styles when writing these and I might name and shame to see if people agree but probably not

( I censored everything because I’m not sure if Tumblr will share this is I’ve got iffy words)

THOUGHT OF ONE MORE

> having all rebellious or gay characters with coloured hair and piercings (obviously there’s outliers to this comment, but there is a really boring trend)

title: Needy
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2GYHdSV

by ilaiza

He was gripping the fabric tight and that smell was driving him crazy. Something like Tony’s perfume and grease and sweat and Peter’s thoughts were getting hazy just thinking about the man wearing it instead of his the usual suit.

title: Bringing him Back

by bethy_277

Peter dies after saving a child on an icy road.
